thread.section_title: Oakfurnitureland Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Oakfurnitureland | oakfurnitureland.com | 7 of 8
thread.title: LSS

author: LSS
title: LSS
text: I ordered the St Ives Natural Light Gray tall bookcase and like it very much. It is well made and a beautiful piece of furniture and complements my decor well. Although it was a long wait, it was worth it. The delivery men were excellent and the customer rep, Iggy, was quite helpful and understanding of all my concerns. Would definitely purchase from again. I believe they are going to soon open a showroom in NYC so am looking forward to seeing the furniture in person.
